channel.title: I followed all the instructions...ANYONE GONNA HELP?!
channel.description:
OK, i followed all the instructions found at the guide here;
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,189074.0.html and my server still will not work. I'll go though and checklist everything I did, so you guys can see and maybe you can help.
Chapter 1: Getting JDK 6u2. I have downloaded it and installed it.
Chapter 2: downloading and installing No-Ip. I downloaded and installed it. I now get a little icon on my tool bar that says 'ip' with a no symbol over it. I have signed in with my email address and password. I can see 'Syrillia.no-ip.org' there. The check box next to it is ticked and there is a happy face. On no-ip.com I have registered, and I have added a host. The name of the host is 'Syrillia.no-ip.org', my host type is 'DNS Host (A)' and I left my IP address as automatic. Which is 82.29.149.25. I might as well tell you because it will make it easier. That was the only thing I changed. No Ip is running with these settings and I have refreshed it.
Chapter 3: Getting a Client I downloaded moparscape. I installed it and it runs OK. I can access other servers and play and everything.
Chapter 4 Opening 43594 (Default Port) I did this. When I open the Exception 'Syrillia' I get this.
Name: Syrillia Port Number: 43594 TCP(o) UDP( )
When I click the scope button, it includes any computer, even those on the internet.
Chapter 5 Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys) I'm using a router. It's make is 'Belkin'. It's model is 'F5D8230-4' The guide I followed is found here:
http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Belkin/F5D8230-4/1st_SMTP_Server.htm
This is the bit where I think something has gone wrong. But maybe not, so don't focus here too much.
This is what I was told to put in for the guide, so I did. If there's anything missing, let me know. [img]http://www.freewebs.com/exgeniaanimation/input.png[/img]
Chapter 6 Getting a source Got testscape. The compiler works, double-checked this. When I run server is says 'starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594' Then, if I load up moparscape, I enter 'localhost' with my username and password, and it opens the games controls, but the play window is black with 'Loading - Please Wait' and then doesn't do anything. Also, no one else can connect to the server.
Any Help?

item.title: I followed all the instructions...ANYONE GONNA HELP?!
item.dc:creator: @SKull_CRusher SKull CRusher
item.description:
@SKull_CRusher wrote:

testscape is bad! get like rickscape its better
testscape is a test to see if you understand

Read full topic

item.title: I followed all the instructions...ANYONE GONNA HELP?!
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

OK, i followed all the instructions found at the guide here;

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,189074.0.html and my server still will not work. I’ll go though and checklist everything I did, so you guys can see and maybe you can help.

Chapter 1: Getting JDK 6u2. I have downloaded it and installed it.

Chapter 2: downloading and installing No-Ip. I downloaded and installed it. I now get a little icon on my tool bar that says ‘ip’ with a no symbol over it. I have signed in with my email address and password. I can see ‘Syrillia.no-ip.org’ there. The check box next to it is ticked and there is a happy face. On no-ip.com I have registered, and I have added a host. The name of the host is ‘Syrillia.no-ip.org’, my host type is ‘DNS Host (A)’ and I left my IP address as automatic. Which is 82.29.149.25. I might as well tell you because it will make it easier. That was the only thing I changed. No Ip is running with these settings and I have refreshed it.

Chapter 3: Getting a Client
I downloaded moparscape. I installed it and it runs OK. I can access other servers and play and everything.

Chapter 4
Opening 43594 (Default Port)
I did this. When I open the Exception ‘Syrillia’ I get this.

Name: Syrillia
Port Number: 43594
TCP(o) UDP( )

When I click the scope button, it includes any computer, even those on the internet.

Chapter 5
Port forwarding (Router Users, Using Linksys)
I’m using a router. It’s make is ‘Belkin’. It’s model is ‘F5D8230-4’
The guide I followed is found here:

http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Belkin/F5D8230-4/1st_SMTP_Server.htm

This is the bit where I think something has gone wrong. But maybe not, so don’t focus here too much.

This is what I was told to put in for the guide, so I did. If there’s anything missing, let me know.

Chapter 6
Getting a source
Got testscape. The compiler works, double-checked this. When I run server is says ‘starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594’
Then, if I load up moparscape, I enter ‘localhost’ with my username and password, and it opens the games controls, but the play window is black with ‘Loading - Please Wait’ and then doesn’t do anything. Also, no one else can connect to the server.

Any Help?

Read full topic
item.source: I followed all the instructions...ANYONE GONNA HELP?!
